tracks.text: The band members play their instruments in a wrestling ring set up in a suburban back yard. Crowds of people fill the backyard and headbang. One man crowdsurfs.
On a sidewalk out front, a 10 year old wearing a white mask does Michael Jackson dance moves. A crowd sits on a lawn and watches him.
Members of the crowd are standing on a nearby shed, watching the band play.
The band leans over at a 45 degree angle.
3 asian elementary school girls jump up and down, holding a sign that says "We heart A. A. F."
A woman jumps on a trampoline. She wears a blue bikini, a black leather jacket, and a werewolf mask. She lands in a swimming pool.
The young boy in the mask continues to perform different Michael Jackson dance moves. A bigger crowd watches him.
The band sings to us. 4 middle aged white men sit in lawn chairs, wearing white tank tops and blue jeans.
The men stand, with their left hand over their crotch and their right hand in the air.
In the evening, the band plays on the lawn, in front of a sidewalk. A crowd dances around them, while more people sit on a roof and watch.
The band vocalist sits in a silver chair shaped like a hand. A chimpanzee sits in his lap. He stares at us intensely.
The band walks slowly down the sidewalk, while playing their instruments. The sidewalk tiles light up when they stand on them.
Sitting with the chimpanzee, the vocalist sings to us with a wide, unchanging, toothy smile. He looks at the chimpanzee, who claps.
In front of a house, the vocalist climbs on top of a minivan, grabs his crotch with one hand, and throws the other in the air. As he screams, smoke and glass explode from the car.
In a yard, men in tattoos do Thriller dance moves. Some of the men wear top hats and a single white glove. Another man is shirtless with a mohawk made of forks.
The vocalist picks up a manhole cover and tosses it. A tower of steam billows behind him. He leans back into the steam and runs his face over his hands.
The vocalist walks down the sidewalk. As he steps on tiles, they light up, evocative of the Michael Jackson "Billie Jean" music video. The vocalist also touches a mailbox, which lights up.
We different shots set up as vertical thirds or horizontal slices, also like in "Billie Jean".
Back in the wrestling ring, the band sings to us.
At night, the band steps on sidewalk tiles, which light up. The bassist leans back into the steam.
The vocalist smiles as the chimpanzee claps. In front of the wrestling right, someone crowdsurfs past a mosh pit.
The young boy in the mask mimes playing drums. He moves sideways without picking up his feet. He moon walks.
The man with a fork mohawk faces away from us, revealing a tattoo of a woman's face. He turns around. His eyes are red and yellow with black vertical slits. Cut to black.
